features.title: Advantages

features.feature2Description: All our doctors are specialists in their field and regularly improve their qualifications
features.feature3Description: Patient safety and comfort are the most important criteria for us

homeAbout.title: About Us
homeAbout.description1: We are a team of highly qualified specialists providing quality medical services. Our clinic is equipped with modern equipment and uses advanced treatment methods.
homeAbout.description2: With many years of experience in the field of otolaryngology, we are proud to help people regain health and improve quality of life. Our doctors constantly improve their skills and follow the latest achievements in medicine.

homeServices.title: Our Services
homeServices.service1Title: ENT Doctor for Children and Adults

aboutPage.heroTitle: Otolor ‚Äì Your Health Is Our Top Priority
aboutPage.heroSubtitle: Modern ENT clinic with over 15 years of experience. We are ready to provide you with the best medical service.
aboutPage.storyTitle: Otolor ENT Clinic ‚Äì Reliable and Experienced Team
aboutPage.storyDesc1: Otolor Clinic has been a leader in the diagnosis and treatment of ear, nose and throat diseases for many years. Our hospital is equipped with modern medical equipment and guarantees an individual approach to each patient.
aboutPage.storyDesc2: We not only treat, but also pay special attention to prevention and promotion of a healthy lifestyle. Our qualified specialists provide services using the experience of the world's leading clinics.
aboutPage.storyCheckpoint3: Best treatment methods in the world
aboutPage.value1Desc: All our doctors are specialists in their field and regularly improve their skills.
aboutPage.value2Desc: We treat only using the latest and most effective technologies.
aboutPage.value3Desc: Patient safety and comfort is the most important criterion for us.
aboutPage.ctaDesc: At our clinic, you will receive the highest level of service. Register for an appointment right now!
